description.narrative: Output 22.02: D'ici fin 2019, 2,632 structure scolaires (CDPE, F1 et F2) dans les rÃ©gion du Mali disposant des outils, et des compÃ©tences pour mettre en Å“uvre et suivre l'Ã©volution des compÃ©tence d'apprentissages des filles et des garÃ§ons - y compris les plus marginalisÃ©s et ceux vivant avec un handicap â€“ de 3 Ã 15 ans, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Sanitation, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: [Equitable Access to Quality Basic Education]: By the end of 2019, the barriers to school attendance for children aged 3â€“15, particularly girls and the most disadvantaged children, have been lifted and children are able to access quality basic education and succeed at school.

description.narrative: Discontinued. No activity has been undertaken on this output in 2018. This output has not been active since end 2017 and will be disactivated as soon as the Open Items related to supply are closed, and orders delivered and paid. | Status:Discontinued | As-of Date:18/07/2018
